data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marek, Paul E., Shear, William A., Bond, Jason E. (2012): A redescription of the leggiest animal, the millipede Illacme plenipes, with notes on its natural history and biogeography (Diplopoda, Siphonophorida, Siphonorhinidae). ZooKeys 241: 77-112, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.241.3831, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.241.3831
